rukus.text: 15|1|Arifu ramu ra. Kore wa Keisuke no shirushi de, mago kata nai kuruan no shirushidearu.
15|2|Shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, jibun-tachi ga musurimudeattanaraba to, nozomu toki ga 屢 々 Arou.
15|3|Kare-ra o honin shi, tabe sase tanoshima sete,(hakanai) kibo ni madowa sete okuga i. Mamonaku kare-ra wa satorudearou.
15|4|Ware wa don'na machi o horobosu baai demo, sadame rareta kigen ga yattekita toki ni soshita.
15|5|Dare mo sono jiki o hayame, mata okurasu koto wa dekinai.
15|6|Kare-ra wa iu. `Kunkai ga keiji sa reta mono yo, hontoni anata wa tsuka reta monodearu.
15|7|Moshi anata (no iu koto) ga shinjitsudearunaraba, naze tenshi o tsurete konai no ka.'
15|8|Ware wa, sorenari no riyu ni yoru igai ni wa tenshi o tsukawasanai. So nareba, kare-ra wa yuyo sa renai nodearu.
15|9|Hontoni ware koso wa, sono kunkai o kudashi, kanarazu sore o shugo suru nodearu.
15|10|Ware wa anata izen no, mukashi no sho shudan ni mo tashikani (shito-tachi o) noko wa shita.
15|11|Daga shito-tachi ga kare-ra no moto ni kuru tabi ni, kare-ra ni yotte chosho sa renai mono wa nakatta.
15|12|Kono yo ni ware wa, tsumibukaimono no kokoro ni,-so suru koto o shinobikoma seta.
15|13|Mukashi no mono-tachi e no senrei ga atta no ni, kare-ra wa kono (keiji) o shinjinai.
15|14|Tatoe ware ga kare-ra no tame ni ten no mon o aite,(zuiji) kare-ra o nobora seyou to shite mo,
15|15|Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`watashi-tachi no me wa hontoni kurande shimatta. Iya watashi-tachi wa mahonikakerarete iru.' To iudearou.
